title: A proclamation for putting the Kingdom of Scotland in a posture of defence against the enemies of the King and government
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1685-1688 : James II)
publisher: Printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson ... ;
notes: "Given under our signet at Holy-rude-House, the 28 day of April, 1685"
Signed by the clerk of the Privy Council.
An order for general mobilization against the Duke of Monmouth's rebellion.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
